00019 {
00020     if (!cond)
00021         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");

00033 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00034                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00035 {
00036     nargchk(nrhs>=2 && nlhs<=3);
00037     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00038     int id = rhs[0].toInt();
00039     string method(rhs[1].toString());
00040 
00041     if (last_id==0)
00042         initModule_nonfree();
00043 
00044     // Constructor call
00045     if (method == "new") {
00046         nargchk(nrhs>=3 && nrhs<=4 && nlhs<=1);
00047         string dmatcher = (nrhs==4) ? rhs[3].toString() : string("BruteForce");
00048         obj_.insert(pair<int,BOWImgDescriptorExtractor>(++last_id,
00049             BOWImgDescriptorExtractor(
00050                 DescriptorExtractor::create(rhs[2].toString()),
00051                 DescriptorMatcher::create(dmatcher)
00052             )));
00053         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00054         return;
00055     }
00056 
00057     // Big operation switch
00058     BOWImgDescriptorExtractor& obj = obj_.find(id)->second;
00059     if (method == "delete") {
00060         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00061         obj_.erase(id);
00062     }
00063     else if (method == "setVocabulary") {
00064         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00065         obj.setVocabulary(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00066     }
00067     else if (method == "getVocabulary") {
00068         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00069         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.getVocabulary());
00070     }
00071     else if (method == "descriptorSize") {
00072         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00073         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.descriptorSize());
00074     }
00075     else if (method == "descriptorType") {
00076         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00077         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.descriptorType());
00078     }
00079     else if (method == "compute") {
00080         nargchk(nrhs==4 && nlhs<=3);
00081         Mat image(rhs[2].isUint8() ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00082         vector<KeyPoint> keypoints(rhs[3].toVector<KeyPoint>());
00083         Mat imgDescriptor;
00084         vector<vector<int> > pointIdxsOfClusters;
00085         Mat descriptors;
00086         obj.compute(image,keypoints,imgDescriptor,&pointIdxsOfClusters,&descriptors);
00087         plhs[0] = MxArray(imgDescriptor);
00088         if (nrhs>1) {
00089             vector<Mat> vm;
00090             vm.reserve(pointIdxsOfClusters.size());
00091             for (vector<vector<int> >::iterator it=pointIdxsOfClusters.begin();it<pointIdxsOfClusters.end();++it)
00092                 vm.push_back(Mat(*it));
00093             plhs[1] = MxArray(vm);
00094         }
00095         if (nrhs>2)
00096             plhs[2] = MxArray(descriptors);
00097     }
00098     else
00099         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation %s", method.c_str());
00100 }
